channel.title: 1 little error
channel.description: here anyone know how to fix? [code]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 800 at Player.<init>(Player.java:57) at client.<init>(client.java:11370) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:157) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]hello? am i alone

item.title: 1 little error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

There is a way to prevent this using IO exceptions. Simply put Try { then put in the code that crashes, and after the code is done, put } catch (IOException e) { }

Read full topic

item.title: 1 little error
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

you put something wrong in playerhandler i think
and it has something to do with the number 800…
maybe you put the number 800 in somewhere and it was too big or small
try and remember the latest updates you tried to do and remember where you put in 800, then fix it one digit higher or lower
